short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modifies Kiva.org to make editing loans easier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Turns Business ID into a link to the published loan
- For group loans, also adds the minimum required number of entrepreneurs that must appear in the photo to the Business Information box on the editing page
- Highlights borrower last names in red if they appear in the description field
